descriptionHtml:
With paladin type characters in mind, Meridia's Fury trades most of Dawnbreaker's Â vanilla fire damage for sun damage.
A small amount of fire remains so the enchantment still has an effect on the living and will still proc shaders from the Burn-Freeze-Shock Effects mod
Only alters on-hit damage, does not in any way change the explosion effects

Compatible with Dawnbreaker vanity mods, but you may want to put them last in load order.
Requires Dawnguard.
author: Halorym
